desc: Terrigal Paddle Boats is one of the top things to do on the Central Coast, great for families, couples and groups, we have been making memories for over 30 years.. You can book on (02) 4365 2355 or just turn up..we have many boats so there is usually no long waits..

layout.text: Terrigal Paddle Boats have been operating for over 30 years, creating happy memories for locals & holiday makers
